dialog.title: Surrender
dialog.body: Are you sure you want to surrender? surrendering will make you lose all your points.

dialog.title: End match
dialog.body: Are you sure you want to end the match? ending the match will save your points and redirect you to the feedback screen.

errors.noResult: Sorry, but we could not find sufficient questions for your game. Try changing your setting to something different!
errors.generic: There was an unexpected error, try again later.
errors.fetchFailed: Sorry, but it was not possible to fetch questions for your trivia game. Try again later.
